transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello

Customer: Haan ji.

Executive: Very good morning sir, Shaldanya baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se. Origame trip pack private limited mein baat ho rahi hai?

Customer: Haan ji haan ji bataiye.

Executive: Ji. Sir abhi aapne ek request bheji hai IndiaMART pe customer care pe call ki thi kya sunna raha tha?

Customer: Mam wo dusre mere ko ek account aur chahiye tha dusre pin code pe to uske liye main kisi se chahta hu office mein visit kar jaye.

Executive: Theek hai. To aapka jo dusra account hai sir uska GST number hoga aapke pass?

Customer: Haan ji haan ji wo registered hai main aapko mobile number batata hu ek already.

Executive: Haan bataiye. Accha theek hai. 92196

Executive: One second. 999

Customer: Nahi nahi 92196

Executive: Sorry 92196. Okay. Ji.

Customer: 32516

Executive: 32516. Ji expert locks karke. Hmm haan ji haan ji sir. Haan ji haan ji.

Executive: Theek hai mujhe haan bataiye sir.

Customer: Haan basically hamari company hai sir Aligarh ki hai.

Customer: Haan ji haan ji to mere ko kisi se bol dijiye hamare ek baar office mein visit kar jaye Aligarh se jo field executive hai na is pin code pe.

Executive: Actually sir field visit ka hamare yaha pe band ho gaya hai field visit possible nahi hai kuch locations mein that's why hum online hi sari chezo ko kya pehle aap ye bataye sir isme services mein kya aap jana chahte hai wo aap video meeting pe aa jaiye main aapko main senior manager.

Customer: Mere ko paid subscription chahiye. Paid subscription mein one year plan.

Executive: One year ka konsa subscription chahiye sir basic plan jo aapka origami pe chal raha hai ya TrustSeal ka ya export ka plan konse subscription chahiye?

Customer: Aap mujhe mujhe jo bhi mujhe ek baar quotation chahiye.

Customer: Ek saal ke aur teen saal ke dono ki basic ki aur kya kehte hai dono TrustSeal mein bhi aur without TrustSeal mein bhi.

Executive: Theek hai aap abhi video meeting pe connect kar sakte hai sir?

Customer: Abhi nahi nahi meri do meeting lined up hai bas mujhe abhi ek quotation wagera chahiye kuch bhi isko final karne ke liye fir main mail id bata sakte hai sir.

Customer: Haan likhiye A A N I N D Alind.

Executive: A N A N D

Customer: Haan ji double A L I N D double A L I N D

Executive: Sorry. L I N D haan.

Customer: @expertlocks.in

Executive: E X P E R T

Customer: Haan

Executive: L O C K S dot in

Executive: Dot in na?

Customer: Ji ji jis naam se account jis naam se account hai wahi basically aur dot in service portal hai.

Executive: Theek hai.

Executive: To aapko MDC ka quotation bhejna hai two year and three year both ka correct sir?

Customer: Haan ji haan ji one year two year one year two year and three ka haan ji TrustSeal mein bhi bata dijiyega kya hai cost fir agar jo theek hai main dono ka aapko quotation sir.

Executive: Theek hai and ek cheez ye bataiyega sir aapko deal kaha kaha pe karna hai like aapke nearby state mein rakhna hai dealing area ya pan India rakhna hai?

Customer: Nahi nahi pan India rakhna hai basically hamara ye already company hai 20 saal purana. To matlab ye pure India mein waise hi supply karte hai kafi time se. To matlab pan India operation aur export ki bhi leads wala jo hai wo bhi dekhna hai.

Executive: Theek hai so export ka bhi aapko share karu detail?

Customer: Wo nahi nahi abhi aap pehle India pan India hi karna. Abhi only TrustSeal and haan theek hai theek hai no issues domestic ke sari services ki details main aapko share kar deti hu. Dusra sir aapne jo ye product add on karwaye hai pad lock and post lock and shutter lock yahi sare products honge sir aapke?

Customer: Yahi products honge uske alawa aur bhi add ho sakte hai but haan kafi kafi products hai.

Executive: Haan haan no issue no issue abhi aur other aapke product hai wo sari cheeze hum add on karwa denge and sir ek cheez aur yaha pe jo aapne ek number bhi update kara rakha hai jo export locks wali hai. So one second sir just a minute open ho raha hai aapka account.

Executive: So sorry sir do minute just line pe rahiyega.

Customer: Mam aapko par executive koi na koi visit karana padega wo bahut jaruri hai uske liye. Sorry aapki voice break ho gayi.

Customer: Main bol raha hu please koi na koi executive visit karane ka wo kariye uske bina convince nahi ho payenge team members. Sir main dono dono hi cheeze baat kar lungi main main samajh gayi main dono hi cheeze baat kar lungi agar possible hoga to main wo bhi aapko bata dungi and agar nahi bhi possible hoga dono hi cheeze baki ka main mail karwa deti hu and discuss bhi aapke apne manager se update kar leti hu sir ki kya cheeze hai yaha pe do number update kiya hua hai sir aapne last ka hai 516 three digits and 336.

Customer: Haan dono office ke hi hai isi company ke.

Executive: Theek hai. Theek hai sir main ek baar team se hamare discuss karke then aapko update kar dungi. Aur aapko call karna ho to jo jis number pe bhi aapne call kara hai ye wala isse karna ye mera number hai.

Executive: Haan haan main isi number pe hi call karungi actually aapne isi number se kiya hai to main isi number se call karungi. Theek hai.

Customer: Theek hai okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants an executive visit to the office.

- Customer needs a quotation for MDC.

- Customer wants quotation for 1, 2 and 3 years.

- Customer wants quotation with and without TrustSeal.



Resolution:

- Executive informed field visits are currently stopped.

- Executive offered a video meeting to discuss services.

- Executive asked for the customer's email ID.

- Executive confirmed to send MDC quotation.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will discuss executive visit with manager.

- Executive will share quotation via email.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- subscription, quotation, trustseal, field visit
